content: Not sure what's going on in https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/92285#issuecomment-1007137318 but crater always crashes with a docker error

@Pietro Albini I've put up a terrible fix https://github.com/rust-lang/crater/pull/590 (also moves CI on crater to nightly because stable and beta are broken with warp, which crater uses)

I have no idea why docker is down for so long, but this fix should I believe let us actually fix things without constant cratebot retries
I plan to merge it once I get CI passing since it's pretty much harmless, but wanted to give you a heads up as well.
my notifications are a disaster, if there's something requiring my attention urgently ping me on zulip
Crater is having a bad time with this PR: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/92413
Nothing to do with that PR, I believe, but posted a retry + a PR to crater which should help eliminate this case in the future.

It looks like we managed to complete and start the next run without breaking, though I suspect we may have oom'd. In any case, it looks like things are behaving more stable than they used to be after a series of patches over the last week. Hopefully that'll continue, but please do post here if things go down again.
